name: Brasserie Nationale d'Haïti S.A. (Prestige)
description: Producer of Haiti's iconic Prestige beer, a major employer and industrial leader.

name: Sogebank
address: Angle Rues Clerveaux et Geffrard, Port-au-Prince
description: One of Haiti's largest and most prominent commercial banking groups.

name: Électricité d'Haïti (ED'H)
description: State-owned public utility responsible for electricity generation and distribution.

name: Caribbean Supermarket (CARIMAX)
description: Leading supermarket chain offering a wide range of local and imported goods.

name: Voilà / Natcom
description: Major provider of mobile, fixed-line, and internet services in Haiti.

name: Mupanah Boutique (Musée du Panthéon National)
description: Boutique associated with the national museum, selling Haitian art, crafts, and books.

name: Agritrans S.A.
description: Pioneering agro-industrial company operating Haiti's largest banana plantation for export.
